title: New: Ben Khan – Savage
body:
Any Sound of 2014 list without **Ben Khan** in it is wrong.

His new track _Savage_ seems him stepping out from the shadows ever-so slightly, with increasing dependency on his vocals. Whilst his earliest track drew obvious and numerous comparisons to XL magician Jai Paul, with every track that Khan puts out, he’s carving out a unique niche for himself, and quite rightly so. This is simply sensational.
